titles.title: Taxpayer Relief Act of 2008
Taxpayer Relief Act of 2008

To exclude $125,000 ($250,000 in the case of a joint return) of taxable income from the individual Federal income tax for 2008 and to reduce the rates of tax on income subject to Federal income tax for 2008.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Taxpayer Relief Act of 2008 - Reduces for 2008 income tax purposes: (1) the taxable income of a taxpayer by $125,000 ($250,000 in the case of a joint return); and (2) the rate of tax on taxable income in excess of $125,000 by 5%.
